adrFormatAddress: 165 W 45th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: I had a great experience with this car service. The vehicle was new, clean inside and out, and ran smoothly. Charles is an absolute first class driver. He opened the door for me, he had beautiful jazz instrumental music softly playing, he drove with skill and care and he knew the area well. He was able to answer questions articulately, his verbal communication skills are excellent. Scheduling was also easy because a real person answered the phone.  I would recommend this service.

originalText.text:
Highly recommend. I called last minute to schedule a 5 hour car service for the day and the team at Perfect Transportation were professional, accommodating, and made booking easy.

The car was clean and communication was top notch.

Will definitely be using their services again when I am back in NYC.

text.text:

originalText.text: 100% recommend using NYC Perfect Transportation, we booked SUV for pick up and drop off at JFK. We had 2 different drivers and cars and both absolutely brilliant. On time waiting for us both ways absolutely no issues at all. Well worth the money using these guys so reliable. Would only use this company if we do return.

text.text: 100% recommend using NYC Perfect Transportation, we booked SUV for pick up and drop off at JFK. We had 2 different drivers and cars and both absolutely brilliant. On time waiting for us both ways absolutely no issues at all. Well worth the money using these guys so reliable. Would only use this company if we do return.

originalText.text: This was my second time using this company for my airport to hotel transportation and the first time for a city (mid-town to Brooklyn) tour. Every experience was absolutely perfect, especially Marwin who drove us around the city. He was so personable and offered to take our picture at sites, and willing to go anywhere we wanted to go in the area.

text.text: This was my second time using this company for my airport to hotel transportation and the first time for a city (mid-town to Brooklyn) tour. Every experience was absolutely perfect, especially Marwin who drove us around the city. He was so personable and offered to take our picture at sites, and willing to go anywhere we wanted to go in the area.

originalText.text:
Fantastic service received by NYC Perfect Transportation. Our flight had been cancelled and our driver Charles made contact to check we were okay and what our new arrangements were. We then had an issue with missing luggage- Charles was extremely patient and understanding. Really polite and pleasant. The car itself was gorgeous and ideal for a family.

Pick up was of the same standard. Yovank texted to let us know he had arrived, helped us with our luggage and was very pleasant. Car again back was immaculate.

Would highly recommend this company!
